module: Module-level comment: The "sim_tb_top" module is a top-level DDR3 memory model simulation testbench. Without any I/O ports, it internally generates the system clock and reset signals, along with DRAM interface signals. It instantiates and drives the "example_top" module (DUT) and DDR3 memory model 'ddr3_model_c3' accordingly. The module monitors the caliberation and error states during the test and reports the status ("TEST PASSED" or "TEST FAILED") based on the test result.
